item.title: Downgrade_virtualbox_for_vagrant
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Don’t just upgrade virtualbox to the latest when work with vagrant Check Vagrant official Doc for compatible version of Virtualbox. I have found misleading information from other places. Now I have to downgrade Virtualbox. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # Uninstall current version of virtualbox 7 choco uninstall virtualbox # Search available versions choco search virtualbox --exact --all-versions # Install a compatible version choco install virtualbox --version=6.
